title: Key Words: Trump says tech giants are ‘all against me,’ but won’t say if investigations are coming
text: President Donald Trump accused tech companies of being “against me” on Monday, but wouldn’t say if federal regulators would take action against them.

title: After Hours: Sarin Scare at Facebook
text: Several of the social media giant's buildings are evacuated in a frightening incident.

title: Highly toxic sarin detected in package at Facebook facility
text: FOX Business’ Liz Claman reports that two workers may have been exposed to sarin at a Facebook mailing facility in California.

title: Facebook (FB) Flat As Market Gains: What You Should Know
text: In the latest trading session, Facebook (FB) closed at $193, marking no change from the previous day.

title: Facebook office evacuated after suspicious package identified
text: A machine at the social networking giant's mail sorting facility warned of a toxic substance at 11 a.m. PT, leading to an evacuation.

title: Facebook employees may have been exposed to sarin: reports
text: Facebook Inc. FB, +0.00% employees may have been exposed to the deadly nerve agent sarin at a mailing facility on Monday, according to media reports.

title: Sarin possibly detected at Facebook mailing facility
text: At least two people may have been possibly exposed to sarin at a Facebook mailing facility in Menlo Park, fire officials said Monday, NBC reports.

title: Facebook creates civil rights task force, vows to protect 2020 censu
text: COO Sheryl Sandberg will chair the group.

title: 85% Not Keen On Facebook Libra As Cryptocurrencies Still Lack Broad Acceptance: IBD/TIPP Poll
text: 85% of Americans aren't interested in the upcoming Facebook Libra digital currency, a new IBD/TIPP Poll found. Most don't plan to buy or use Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies over the next 10 years.

title: The New York Post: Facebook says it’s taking steps to ban misinformation about 2020 census
text: Facebook plans to treat the 2020 U.S. Census “like an election” — with “people, policies, and technology in place” to protect against interference, the company said Sunday.

title: Should Big Tech Companies Break Up? Many Consumers Say Yes
text: Washington politicians have struck a chord with voters with their calls to break up big tech companies. A new poll finds consumers worried about Amazon and Google monopolies and data privacy.

title: 5 Overrated Growth Stocks to Sell Now
text: Beneath the surface, not one of these popular stocks is strong enough to tempt me.

title: Facebook Stock Is Great, but FB Is a Terrible Company
text: Facebook  is having a great year in the markets with FB stock up 47% in 2019. If you’re concerned about ESG, I’d stay away from FB.

title: FA Center: Here’s what Apple, Facebook and other Big Tech investors can learn from IBM’s antitrust ordeal
text: Investors are worried about possible federal antitrust action on big technology companies, and that’s one factor contributing to the technology sector struggling in recent weeks.
